
The code below demostrates the Mgma polette in the [viridis] (https://github.com/sjmgarnier/viridis) package. It displays a contour map of the Maunga Whau volvano in Auckland, New Zealand.

## Magma colors

```{r fig.cap="The Maunga Whau volcano, Auckland."}
image(volcano,col=viridis(200,option = "A"))
```
